	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM STAGE.VBAP',
	format: 'query') ~> sourceStageVBAP
sourceStageVBAK select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		VBELN,
		AWAHR,
		BNAME,
		BSTDK,
		VKORG,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS_VF,
		KUNNR,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColVBAK
SelectColVBAK derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT),
		AWAHR = toInteger(AWAHR),
		BSTDK = toInteger(BSTDK)) ~> ChangeDataTypeVBAK
sourceStageVBAP select(mapColumn(
		MANDT,
		VBELN,
		POSNR,
		AUFNR,
		MATNR,
		NETPR,
		WAERK,
		KWMENG,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColVBAP
SelectColVBAP derive(MANDT = toInteger(MANDT),
		POSNR = toInteger(POSNR),
		NETPR = toFloat(NETPR),
		KWMENG = toInteger(KWMENG),
		AUFNR = toInteger(AUFNR)) ~> ChangeDataTypeVBAP
ChangeDataTypeVBAK, ChangeDataTypeVBAP join(ChangeDataTypeVBAK@MANDT == ChangeDataTypeVBAP@MANDT
	&& SelectColVBAK@VBELN == SelectColVBAP@VBELN,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(HASHKEY_BK = md5('_',ChangeDataTypeVBAK@MANDT,'_',SelectColVBAK@VBELN,'_'),
		HASHKEY_DATA = md5('_',AWAHR,'_',BNAME,'_',BSTDK,'_',VKORG,'_',VTWEG,'_',BUKRS_VF,'_',KUNNR,'_'),
		CREATED_ON = currentTimestamp(),
		SOURCE = 'asapSql.STAGE.VBAK_asapSql.STAGE.VBAP') ~> CreateHash
CreateHash select(mapColumn(
		MANDT = {ChangeDataTypeVBAK@MANDT},
		VBELN = {SelectColVBAK@VBELN},
		MATNR,
		AUFNR,
		KUNNR,
		AWAHR,
		BNAME,
		VKORG,
		VTWEG,
		BUKRS_VF,
		POSNR,
		NETPR,
		WAERK,
		KWMENG,
		BSTDK,
		HASHKEY_BK,
		HASHKEY_DATA,
		CREATED_ON,
		SOURCE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnOrder
SelectColumnOrder aggregate(groupBy(MANDT,
		VBELN,
		VKORG,
		VTWEG),
	each(match(name!='MANDT'&&name!='VBELN'&&name!='VKORG'&&name!='VTWEG'), $$ = first($$))) ~> distincRows
distincRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['TRUNCATE TABLE CLEANSE.SALES'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkCleanseSALES
